body:
this was legit my first ever doujin i ever read so i'd like to say fuck this for sending me down into the dark abyss that is japanese porno comics. 
and also this still slaps

Serena and Shauna: *look scared*

Perverts: Come on girls.  We just want to play with you!!

Me: *taps on both of their shoulders*

Perverts: Huh? *turn around*

Me: *cracks knuckles* How about you guys play with my fist!! *punches them all in the face*

Perverts: *painful groans*

Me: Serena!  Shauna!  You two alright?

Serena: Yeah.  Thanks.

Me: Anytime.
Shut up and take my money!
